title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki-notifications on 29 May 2017 - XWiki
content:
<xwikibot> has joined #xwiki-notifications  
17:38 <VincentMassol[m]> yes we have a problem since we move to the cluster  
17:38 <VincentMassol[m]> I don't know why the bot is not restarting automatically  
17:38 <VincentMassol[m]> we have a scheduler job to do it but for some reason it's not working  
17:39 <VincentMassol[m]> FTR: http://dev.xwikiorg-node1.xwikisas.com/xwiki/bin/view/Scheduler/  
17:40 <VincentMassol[m]> and you can see on node2 that the scheduler is not there: http://dev.xwikiorg-node2.xwikisas.com/xwiki/bin/view/Scheduler/  
17:41 <VincentMassol[m]> and bot is stopped on node2  
17:54 <evalica> on node2 it doesn't say it's stopped, it displays the variables "$status $firetime"  
18:00 <VincentMassol[m]> yes  
18:00 <VincentMassol[m]> that's because the scheduler plugin is disabled  
18:25 <evalica> has quit
